dataStudio.name: ODK Central
dataStudio.description: Explore and visualize your ODK data. To use this connector, you will need a Web User account on a Central server. If you don't already have a Central server, you can set one up yourself (https://docs.getodk.org/central-install/). When you are prompted for a Path below, please specify the OData link of the form you want to analyze.
dataStudio.shortDescription: Connect to your ODK Central server and build dashboards for all your projects.
